features: Save by the pack: Get 12 composition notebooks with 100 sheets of college ruled paper in each; a stock-up staple for your school supplies list
Sturdy composition book covers protect your notes; great for school writing or science notebooks, home school assignments and home office tasks
College ruled paper fits more lines per page; sturdy stock handles mechanical pencils, gel pens, ink pens and highlighters for perfect notes
Black marble notebook covers have conversion charts and a blank class schedule inside; use erasable pens to update your schedule as needed
Sewn pages are permanently bound; more secure than spiral notebooks for notes, journal, or bullet journal entries that last
body.description: Oxford composition notebook multipacks now come in bulk 12 packs perfect for school supplies, office supplies and everyday uses. These college-ruled notebooks provide skinny lines to fit more creative writing, journaling, note taking or lab work per page than wide-ruled paper. Center-sewn notebook pages make the composition book a teacher favorite. Creates a tamper-evident, permanently bound journal, science notebook, bullet journal or writing notebook. Also makes a great home school preschool tool for beginning writers. Sturdy paper handles ink pens, colored pencils and highlighters for fun writing practice and beautiful notes. Classic marble covers have a space for name and class, and weight and measurement conversion charts inside. Composition notebooks are an affordable option for the home office, traditional or home school students, journalers, writers, artists, scientists and note takers of all stripes. College ruled. 9-3/4" x 7-1/2". 100 Sheets. 12 Per pack.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TOPS/Oxford Composition Book TOPS Composition Books have a classic format ideal for journaling, lab assignments, note taking or for any class requiring notebook submissions. The secure center-sewn binding assures your pages stay intact. Classic black marble covers have an area for your name and class and handy conversion charts inside.
Secure center-sewn binding keeps pages intact Classic black marbled covers include class schedule and conversion charts inside College ruled; 7-1/2" x 9-3/4" notebooks; 100 sheets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Notebooks as expected
reviews.reviewText: Solid notebooks at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW a review for a notebook what can be so important
reviews.reviewText: So why would a blank notebook deserve a review. Let alone why would a blank notebook deserve a 5 star review.I go through some 20 of these a year myself and the classes that we teach at a vocational program uses some 300 a year.So, I have ordered these products from other brands and there have been some quality issues. Here is where and why I continue to buy these.Our students are transient, some are homeless, some have a hard existence. the classes range from culinary to construction to high school to computers. These note books often get folded in half and stuck in a back pocket or tucked in the fold of a cooking class apron.The front and back covers are pretty tough and survive being bent. The spine is equally tough. The books get twisted back so they lay flat and the spines cracked in the process and they hold up well.The machines that fold and bind these pages do a good job. Some of our orders from other cheaper brands have pages cut near the spine. This makes for odd opening of the book and the pages twisted when open so writing becomes skewed. Very good consistent quality.Yes you can order notebooks with as many or even MORE pages. We ordered a batch that had 50 more pages from another brand. The paper was so thin I thought I was looking at the onion paper my parents used in Post WWII Europe to save on Air Mail Postage. They also bled and tore easily. The lined portion was thin and light.The page thickness and durability is very good and consistent. Yes you can buy notebooks with thicker pages and beautiful deep colored lines....but not at this price range. The students are often rushed and some are heavy handed. Some write so hard that they literally tattoo the word through the page to other side like braille. It is the mark of a good quality paper that can handle that consistently and does not tear.Many of our students use packing tape across cover for use in their wet culinary class and for the construction class. This makes the notebooks near indestructible.Quality makes all the difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable But Not a Good Lasting Product
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- This is an affordable when you compare the price per quantity (12 for $20)Cons:- Would not recommend if you plan to keep the notes/records for long term use.Back of the book eventually falls off than the binding comes apart. Not happy as I use notebooks frequently for keeping track of important records.- Since the binding is with the cover, if you fold the cover - the cover rips and the binding become loose. Eventually the entire book comes apart. Terrible for long term use.

reviews.reviewText: It was well packaged in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for quantity
reviews.reviewText: I so needed this many! Organizing made easier for me by having several these for each area of my life. This way, I don’t have to reads thru a ton of notes to find what I’m looking for.
